ALL_RECORDS_WITHOUT_SCIENTIFIC_NAME: All supplied records are missing a scientificName, a taxonID or taxonConceptID. Please add this field to your CSV and try again.
SOME_RECORDS_WITHOUT_SCIENTIFIC_NAME: Some of the supplied records are missing a scientific name, a taxonID or taxonConceptID. Please add this field to your CSV and try again.
CONSERVATION_LIST_VALIDATION_FAILED: Conservation lists require a status column
INVASIVE_VALIDATION_FAILED: Invasive lists require a status column
SENSITIVE_LIST_VALIDATION_FAILED: Sensitive lists require a generalisation column
interpreted.values.warning: Note: Interpreted values are matched against the national checklists. These may differ from the original values supplied.
wkt.help: Well Known Text (WKT) is a text markup language for representing vector geometry objects on a map. For example, a point in WKT looks like this: POINT (30 10).
